extendedInfo.description: The Law Firm of Dennis P. Block and Associates is the leading law firm in the State of California for representing landlords in tenant eviction casesThis application is designed to help landlords that have an existing case with the our firm or landlords that have general legal questions or want their legal notices evaluated. This application is designed to do the following items:       1. Existing clients can get a status on their eviction case or make a payment on their account       2. A convenient way to email a question on an existing case or on a general question dealing with Landlord/Tenant Law. (California Only)       3. Upload your signed documents to our office in cases where you do not have a fax or a scanner.       4. Have our law firm legally evaluate the sufficiency of a notice that you plan to serve on your tenant. (California Only)       5. A convenient way to phone our office.

reviews.comment: Great App! I am a property supervisor and this app is very very useful to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This is a must have app for every apartment owner and landlord! I can get my case status and questions answered fast. Perfect when your on the go or in your office.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for
reviews.author: D. Uggla
